bug.short_desc: SELinux is preventing hdparm from 'ioctl' accesses on the blk_file /dev/sr0.
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Plug in the power supply SELinux is preventing hdparm from 'ioctl' accesses on the blk_file /dev/sr0.
***** Plugin catchall (100. confidence) suggests **************************
If sie denken, dass es hdparm standardmäßig erlaubt sein sollte, ioctl Zugriff auf sr0 blk_file zu erhalten. Then sie sollten dies als Fehler melden. Um diesen Zugriff zu erlauben, können Sie ein lokales Richtlinien-Modul erstellen. Do allow this access for now by executing: # ausearch -c 'hdparm' --raw | audit2allow -M my-hdparm # semodule -X 300 -i my-hdparm.pp
Additional Information: Source Context system_u:system_r:tlp_t:s0 Target Context system_u:object_r:removable_device_t:s0 Target Objects /dev/sr0 [ blk_file ] Source hdparm Source Path hdparm Port <Unknown> Host (removed) Source RPM Packages Target RPM Packages Policy RPM selinux-policy-3.13.1-225.11.fc25.noarch Selinux Enabled True Policy Type targeted Enforcing Mode Enforcing Host Name (removed) Platform Linux (removed) 4.10.5-200.fc25.x86_64 #1 SMP Wed Mar 22 20:37:08 UTC 2017 x86_64 x86_64 Alert Count 1 First Seen 2017-03-28 19:22:51 CEST Last Seen 2017-03-28 19:22:51 CEST Local ID 0649de67-61db-4caa-beeb-83e827d999cc
Raw Audit Messages type=AVC msg=audit(1490721771.977:186): avc: denied { ioctl } for pid=3813 comm="hdparm" path="/dev/sr0" dev="devtmpfs" ino=1122 ioctlcmd=0x2285 scontext=system_u:system_r:tlp_t:s0 tcontext=system_u:object_r:removable_device_t:s0 tclass=blk_file permissive=1
Hash: hdparm,tlp_t,removable_device_t,blk_file,ioctl
Version-Release number of selected component: selinux-policy-3.13.1-225.11.fc25.noarch
Additional info: reporter: libreport-2.8.0 hashmarkername: setroubleshoot kernel: 4.10.5-200.fc25.x86_64 type: libreport
Potential duplicate: bug 1416980

Description of problem: Boot the system
Version-Release number of selected component: selinux-policy-3.13.1-225.11.fc25.noarch
Additional info: reporter: libreport-2.8.0 hashmarkername: setroubleshoot kernel: 4.10.9-200.fc25.x86_64 type: libreport
